errors.createSessionError: An error occurred while creating the session
errors.noStudyRoute: You haven't created any study route yet.

empty.title: Empty study route
empty.description: Currently you don't have any study route. Please create a route to start learning.

timeline.title: English Learning Route
timeline.description: Complete learning activities in order to achieve the best results
timeline.alert: You can only create one route at a time.

delete.confirmTitle: Are you sure you want to delete this route?
delete.confirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. All your learning progress in this route will be deleted.

daily_communication.label: Daily communication
daily_communication.description: Confidently converse, make friends, and handle common situations in life.

work.label: Work purposes
work.description: Use English in the workplace, write emails, attend meetings, and give presentations.

travel.label: Travel
travel.description: Have enough vocabulary to ask for directions, book rooms, order food, and explore the world independently.

study_exam.label: Study / Exams
study_exam.description: Improve school grades or prepare for level-up exams, university entrance exams.

certificate.label: Certificate preparation
certificate.description: Practice for international certificates such as IELTS, TOEIC, TOEFL, or Cambridge.

immigration.label: Overseas settlement
immigration.description: Prepare language skills to adapt to living and working environments in a new country.

personal_interest.label: Personal interest
personal_interest.description: Watch movies, listen to music, read books, or simply challenge yourself with a new language.
